mapper.select: SELECT SI.STO_NUM, STO_NAME, STO_ADDR, ORD_LIMIT, OPEN_YN, DELIVERY, BRAND_PIC, STO_LAT, STO_LNG, AVG(REV_RATE) FROM STORE_INFO SI LEFT OUTER JOIN STORE_REVIEW SR ON SI.STO_NUM = SR.STO_NUM JOIN BRAND B ON SI.BRAND_CODE = B.BRAND_CODE GROUP BY SI.STO_NUM, STO_NAME, STO_ADDR, ORD_LIMIT, OPEN_YN, DELIVERY, BRAND_PIC, STO_LAT, STO_LNG ORDER BY STO_NUM

SELECT STO_NUM, STO_NAME, STO_ADDR, ORD_LIMIT, OPEN_YN, DELIVERY, BRAND_PIC, STO_LAT, STO_LNG, REV_RATE FROM( SELECT S.STO_NUM, STO_NAME, STO_ADDR, ORD_LIMIT, OPEN_YN, DELIVERY, BRAND_PIC, STO_LAT, STO_LNG, SUM(ORD_PRICE), AVG(REV_RATE) AS REV_RATE FROM STORE_INFO S LEFT OUTER JOIN ORDER_PRO O ON S.STO_NUM = O.STO_NUM JOIN BRAND B ON S.BRAND_CODE = B.BRAND_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN STORE_REVIEW SR ON S.STO_NUM=SR.STO_NUM GROUP BY S.STO_NUM, STO_NAME, STO_ADDR, ORD_LIMIT, OPEN_YN, DELIVERY, BRAND_PIC, STO_LAT, STO_LNG ORDER BY 10 DESC NULLS LAST )
